actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources

official_title: To amend the Mineral Leasing Act to encourage greater competition in the federal onshore oil and gas leasing program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Oil and Gas Leasing Amendment Act of 1989

summary.text: Federal Oil and Gas Leasing Amendment Act of 1989 - Amends the Mineral Leasing Act to reduce the primary oil and gas lease terms for noncompetitive leases from ten to five years.

titles.title: Federal Oil and Gas Leasing Amendment Act of 1989
To amend the Mineral Leasing Act to encourage greater competition in the federal onshore oil and gas leasing program, and for other purposes.
